name: Elf
description: Elves are wild humanoids, distinguisable by their long, pointed ears and skin tones which range from light blue to dark green. They typically live hard, long lives in small settlements in the most dangerous of the Fonteran jungles as a result of their displacement from their wars with the Orcs. Elven blood is infused with the cosmos, creating a culture that has learned to worship the stars and their meaning.

options.name: Born of Starlight
options.description: You are Immutable and cannot be affected by Magic that alters your form, changes your size, or transmutation spells that affect the speed at which you move or act.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Nebulous Eyes
options.description: Your eyes glow hazy and dark with the power of the cosmos. For the next minute, you gain Truevision and a 1d4 Bonus to Resistance.
